statements: SELECT * FROM investment_advisors
SELECT advisor_name, client_name FROM investment_advisors
SELECT advisor_id, advisor_name, client_id FROM investment_advisors WHERE client_risk_profile = 'High'
SELECT * FROM investment_advisors WHERE advisor_id = 3
SELECT advisor_name, client_name, client_risk_profile FROM investment_advisors ORDER BY client_risk_profile
SELECT * FROM investment_advisors WHERE advisor_id = 1;
SELECT advisor_name, client_name, client_risk_profile FROM investment_advisors WHERE advisor_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT advisor_name, client_name FROM investment_advisors WHERE client_risk_profile = 'High';
SELECT advisor_name, client_name, investment_plan FROM investment_advisors WHERE client_id = 3 ORDER BY advisor_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT advisor_id, advisor_name FROM investment_advisors WHERE client_id <> 2;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, risk_profile FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE risk_profile = 'High';
SELECT plan_name, plan_details FROM investment_plans WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE risk_profile = 'Moderate' ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, plan_name FROM clients JOIN investment_plans ON clients.client_id = investment_plans.client_id WHERE clients.risk_profile = 'Low' ORDER BY plan_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Client;
SELECT client_name, risk_profile FROM Client ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPlan WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT client_name, start_date, end_date FROM Client JOIN InvestmentPlan ON Client.client_id = InvestmentPlan.client_id;
SELECT profile_name, risk_level FROM RiskProfile WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM Client WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT client_id, client_name, risk_profile FROM Client WHERE risk_profile = 'High';
SELECT plan_id, start_date, end_date FROM InvestmentPlan ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT profile_id, profile_name FROM RiskProfile WHERE risk_level = 'Low' ORDER BY profile_name ASC;

SELECT Client.client_name, InvestmentPlan.amount, RiskProfile.risk_level FROM Client JOIN InvestmentPlan ON Client.client_id = InvestmentPlan.client_id JOIN RiskProfile ON Client.risk_profile = RiskProfile.profile_name;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT name, risk_profile FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE client_id = 5 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT client_id, investment_type, amount FROM investments WHERE client_id = 3 AND amount > 500;
SELECT p.profile_name, COUNT(*) as total_clients FROM risk_profiles p JOIN investment_plans ip ON p.profile_id = ip.profile_id GROUP BY p.profile_name ORDER BY total_clients DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT name, risk_profile FROM clients WHERE risk_profile='High';
SELECT clients.name, investments.investment_type, investments.amount FROM clients INNER JOIN investments ON clients.client_id = investments.client_id;

SELECT clients.name, risk_profiles.profile_name, risk_profiles.risk_score FROM clients INNER JOIN investment_plans ON clients.client_id = investment_plans.client_id INNER JOIN risk_profiles ON investment_plans.profile_id = risk_profiles.profile_id;
SELECT DISTINCT clients.name, investments.investment_type, investments.amount FROM clients INNER JOIN investments ON clients.client_id = investments.client_id ORDER BY clients.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, risk_profile FROM clients WHERE risk_profile='Low';
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE risk_level='High';
SELECT advisor_name, bio FROM advisors;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, risk_profile FROM clients ORDER BY risk_profile DESC;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT advisor_name, bio FROM advisors WHERE advisor_name LIKE '%John%';
